import React from 'react' const PlayerStats = ({ selectedPlayer }) => { return ( <>
{/* PLAYED CHAMPION ICON */}
{/* SUMMONER SPELLS */}
{/* RUNES */}
{/* PLAYER SCORE */}
{`${selectedPlayer.kills} / ${selectedPlayer.deaths} / ${selectedPlayer.assists}`}
{((selectedPlayer.kills + selectedPlayer.assists)/ selectedPlayer.deaths).toFixed(2)}
{/* ITEMS */}
    {showItem(selectedPlayer)}
) } export default PlayerStats
